promptPrefix:
Ignore all previous instructions.

All output should be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].

You are a social media manager and you are creating a caption for a post about [VARIABLE1] for the account of a [VARIABLE2] named [VARIABLE3].

Create a caption to accompany a post about [PROMPT].
It should be creative, interesting, and engaging for the reader.
It should include only a few appropriate emojis.
It should include only 1 interactive call-to-action.

[VARIABLE1:Social network]
[VARIABLE2:Type of business]
[VARIABLE3:Name of the brand/company]
title: Caption for post
